Ancestry-Hobgoblin -- Male Warrenbred Hobgoblin Fighter
Strength: +1 Dexterity: +2 Constitution: +2 Intelligence: +3 Wisdom: +0 Charisma: +1
Background: Acolyte Deity: Gozreh
Experience: 134/1000 Level: 1 Speed: 20 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 6/11
Attribute Notes:
Armor Speed Penalty: -5 Speed
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Shortshanks Hobgoblin: Not off-guard during Climb
War Conditioning (Climb): Has a 20' climb Speed
War Conditioning (Swim): Has a 20' swim Speed
Features/Skills

Runtsage: Has the Adopted Ancestry (Goblin) feature
Shortshanks Hobgoblin: Has the Ride feature
Adopted Ancestry (Goblin): May take Goblin ancestry feats
Alchemical Scholar: Knows +1 alchemical formulas
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Fell Rider: Animal companion is trained in Intimidation and can give Aid on Demoralize attempts
Ride: Automatically succeeds when using Command an Animal to move/Mount acts on self turn
Perception: +5 (wisdom; expert)

Arcana: +3 (intelligence; untrained) Intimidation: +1 (charisma; untrained) Society: +3 (intelligence; untrained)

Skill Notes:
Alchemical Crafting: Knows the formulas for 4 common 1st-level alchemical items
Armor Skill Penalty: -2 strength and dexterity skills
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 6 from any)
Hobgoblin Lore: Skill Trained (Athletics; Crafting)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +3 Language Count
Agonizing Rebuke: Successful Demoralize inflicts 1d4 mental each rd for 1 min or until moving 30' away
Alchemical Crafting: Can use Crafting to create alchemical items
Expert Drill Sergeant: Following An Expert while exploring gives allies a +2, +3, or +4 bonus on skills with trained, expert, or master proficiency
Formula Book: Has a book that contains at least 4 alchemical formulas
Sneaky: +5 Sneak speed, and can Sneak between cover
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Warmarch Hobgoblin: Normal failures to Subsist in wilderness allow eating/Can Hustle twice as long as normal when exploring
Warrenbred Hobgoblin: Successes on Acrobatics to Squeeze are critical successes/Reduces flat check to attack a concealed or hidden target to 3 or 9
Combat
Hit Points: 20 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (2 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 15 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Hide Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Falchion (+6 1d10+1 S; strength; expert); Sap (+6 1d6+1 B; strength; expert); Shield Bash (+6 1d4+1 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Can't Fall Here: (R) Adjacent willing ally reduced to 0 Hit Point retains 1 Hit Point and gains 1 temporary Hit Points and a wounded level for 1 min once per day
Cantorian Rejuvenation: (2) Recovers 4d6 HP and gains 10 temporary HP for 1 min once per day
Cantorian Restoration: (R) R60' Restores 6d6+2 Hit Points to a dying creature once per day
Hobgoblin Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon hobgoblin weapons
Hobgoblin Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Familiarity (Hobgoblin Weapons; Composite Longbow; Composite Shortbow; Glaive; Longbow; Longsword; Shortbow)
Leech-Clip: Hits with flails inflict -10' Speed, or -15' Speed on a critical hit, for 1 rd
Pride In Arms: (R) Gives 30 temporary HP for 1 rd to an ally that brings a foe to 0 HP
Rallying Cry: (2) 30' emanation gives alies 1 temporary Hit Points and an additional Step, Stride, or Strike each rd for 1 min
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Recognize Ambush: (F) Draws a weapon during initiative
Remorseless Lash: Melee hits inflict no reduction of frightened condition for 1 rd
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Squad Tactics: Adjacent foes within reach of two allies are off-guard to self
Vicious Swing: (2) Melee Strike inflicts 1 extra dice damage and counts as two Strikes for multiple attack penalty
Save: Fortitude: +7 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +7 (dexterity; expert); Will: +3 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Cantorian Reinforcement: Successes vs. disease or poison are critical successes
Stone Face: +1 vs. fear; +2 Will DC vs. Intimidation
Vigorous Health: Successful DC 17 flat check negates gaining the drained condition
